tweets.text: @MofaJapan_en Thanks to @MofaJapan_jp for the congratulations on my appointment. I look forward to deepening our important partnership, based on shared fundamental values, ahead of Japanese G7 Presidency in 2023.
@nicupopescu Thanks @nicupopescu! Italy will continue to support Moldova´s path to EU accession and I look forward to giving continuity to our strong political dialogue.

@GLandsbergis Thanks Gabrielius Landsbergis! I remember indeed the time when we worked together at the European Parliament and I am sure that we will have soon the opportunity to continue the fruitful cooperation between our countries, bilaterally and in the EU.

@edgarsrinkevics Thanks @edgarsrinkevics for your kind message! Eager to have Italy & Latvia working together at EU and NATO level to find effective solutions to the multiple challenges we are facing.

@RastislavKacer @SlovakiaMFA @ItalyMFA_int Thank you @RastislavKacer. Italy-Slovakia excellent bilateral relations are indeed strong basis for working together on common solutions to the challenges of our time both bilaterally and in the EU.

@BogdanAurescu Thank you @BogdanAurescu. Building upon our close ties, I look forward to developing further our Enhanced Strategic Partnership and giving greater continuity to our bilateral cooperation and our common efforts in the EU.
@RauZbigniew Thank you very much @RauZbigniew for your kind wishes. I look forward to enhancing our bilateral cooperation and work closely with you in the EU and in the multilateral fora.

@MinisterIanBorg @RaffaeleFitto Thank you @MinisterIanBorg! I am eager to work with you to strenghten the already close bilateral relations between our countries & to improve our cooperation in the #EU and in the #Mediterranean.

@NikosDendias Thank you @NikosDendias. Building upon the traditional friendship between Italy and Greece, I will work to further develop our cooperation bilaterally, within the #EU and across the #Mediterranean.

@IKasoulides @CyprusMFA @CyprusinItaly @ItalyMFA @ItalyinCyprus @ChristofidesY Thank you @IKasoulides. I am sure that we will work together to strengthen our already close relations and develop synergies both bilaterally and within the #EU.

@TobiasBillstrom Thank you @TobiasBillstrom. Looking foward to meeting you, ahead of next 🇸🇪 Presidency of the EU, to further deepen our relations and close cooperation on the European and international stage.

@hadjalahbib @luigidimaio Thank you @HadjaLahbib. 🇮🇹 & 🇧🇪, as founding Member States, will continue to have a primary role in EU and an ever closer and wider bilateral cooperation. Looking forward to working together.

@WBHoekstra @luigidimaio @ItalyMFA @ItalyMFA_int @NLinItaly @DutchMFA Thank you Wopke Hoekstra. Looking forward to working with you to strengthen the solid 🇮🇹 🇳🇱 cooperation on the EU agenda and to meet the common challenges ahead, starting from the energy crisis.
